scanners.name: Child Exploitation
scanners.definition: Content involving child exploitation, child abuse, child sexual content, child nudity, or other content harmful to minors

scanners.name: Violent Crime
scanners.definition: Content depicting or promoting violent crimes including murder, assault, terrorism, torture, or other violent criminal activities

scanners.name: Non-Violent Crime
scanners.definition: Content related to non-violent crimes including fraud, drug trafficking, human trafficking, cybercrime, money laundering, or other illegal activities

scanners.name: Pornography
scanners.definition: Content containing explicit sexual acts, adult nudity, sexual content, or pornographic material

scanners.name: Hate & Discrimination
scanners.definition: Content promoting hate, discrimination, prejudice, or bias based on race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation, disability, or other protected characteristics

scanners.name: Profanity
scanners.definition: Content containing profane language, vulgar expressions, offensive slurs, or obscene speech

scanners.name: Privacy Invasion
scanners.definition: Content involving unauthorized disclosure of personal information, identity theft, doxxing, or violations of personal privacy

scanners.name: Commercial Violations
scanners.definition: Content related to commercial fraud, false advertising, unfair competition, pyramid schemes, or violations of commercial regulations

scanners.name: Intellectual Property Infringement
scanners.definition: Content involving plagiarism, copyright infringement, patent violations, trademark violations, or theft of intellectual property

scanners.name: Harassment
scanners.definition: Content involving harassment, bullying, stalking, humiliation, verbal abuse, or persistent unwanted contact

scanners.name: Weapons of Mass Destruction
scanners.definition: Content related to chemical weapons, biological weapons, nuclear weapons, radiological weapons, or other weapons of mass destruction

scanners.name: Self-Harm
scanners.definition: Content promoting or encouraging self-harm, suicide, eating disorders, or other self-destructive behaviors

scanners.name: Sexual Crimes
scanners.definition: Content related to sexual assault, rape, sexual harassment, sexual exploitation, or other sexual crimes

scanners.name: Threats
scanners.definition: Content containing violent threats, intimidation, coercion, or threatening language directed at individuals or groups
